      This requires the KNetSyncedUniverse.ATTACHMENT_KEY attachment. This can optionally make use of the ID_PALETTE attachment.

  • Method Details

    • attachPalette

      public static <B1 extends net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf & com.kneelawk.knet.api.util.NetBuf<B1>, B2 extends net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf, V> net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<B1,V> attachPalette(net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<? super B2,V> wrappedCodec, com.kneelawk.codextra.api.attach.stream.ChildBufferFactory<? super B1,B2> childBufferCtor)
      Wraps the given StreamCodec codec in a palette that will be used in both encoding and decoding.

      This provides the ID_PALETTE attachment.

      Type Parameters:
      B1 - the type of the parent buffer.
      B2 - the type of the child buffer.
      V - the result type.
      Parameters:
      wrappedCodec - the codec to wrap.
      childBufferCtor - the constructor for the buffer type the wrapped codec uses.
      Returns:
      the wrapper stream codec.

    • registryAttachPalette

      public static <V> net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<com.kneelawk.knet.api.util.NetRegistryByteBuf,V> registryAttachPalette(net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<? super com.kneelawk.knet.api.util.NetRegistryByteBuf,V> wrappedCodec)
      Wraps the given StreamCodec codec in a palette that will be used in both encoding and decoding, using a buffer capable of being used as a RegistryFriendlyByteBuf.

      This provides the ID_PALETTE attachment.

      Type Parameters:
      V - the result type.
      Parameters:
      wrappedCodec - the codec to wrap.
      Returns:
      the wrapper stream codec.

    • netAttachPalette

      public static <V> net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<com.kneelawk.knet.api.util.NetRegistryByteBuf,V> netAttachPalette(net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<? super com.kneelawk.knet.api.util.RegistryNetByteBuf,V> wrappedCodec)
      Wraps the given StreamCodec codec in a palette that will be used in both encoding and decoding, using a buffer capable of being used as a NetByteBuf.

      This provides the ID_PALETTE attachment.

      Type Parameters:
      V - the result type.
      Parameters:
      wrappedCodec - the codec to wrap.
      Returns:
      the wrapper stream codec.
